post.description: Generate the authentication link for connecting a QuickBooks account.
Create a QuickBooks account mapping and return the associated Ledger

If an error is encountered while syncing transactions with a source (ex. Plaid),
an HTTP POST request with a body following this schema will be sent to your
registered webhook URL.

Upon successful completion of a transaction sync with a source (ex. Plaid),
an HTTP POST request with a body following this schema will be sent to your
registered webhook URL.

debit_credit.description: Whether the amount is a credit or debit.

id.title: Id
id.description: The ID of the transaction. The ID is unique per ledger.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Any metadata that you would like to associate with the transaction. This metadata will be available to the auto-categorization pipeline for assistance in properly categorizing the transaction automatically. This metadata is entirely configurable by you; this parameter will accept any key-value pairs you care to submit with the transaction for later use.

total_debit_amount.title: Total Debit Amount
total_debit_amount.description: The sum debit amount of entries in the ledger including its children.

debit_amount.title: Debit Amount
debit_amount.description: The sum debit amount of entries in the ledger.

children.title: Children
children.description: A list of child cash flow ledgers

debit_amount.title: Debit Amount
debit_amount.description: The debit amount of the line entry.

datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: The datetime that the line entry occurred.

debit_balance.title: Debit Balance
debit_balance.description: The debit balance of the entries in the ledger.

total_debit_balance.title: Total Debit Balance
total_debit_balance.description: The debit balance of the entries in the ledger including children.

children.title: Children
children.description: A list of child cash flow ledger balances

expression.title: Expression
expression.description: The expression to match on transactions.

ledger_name.title: Ledger Name
ledger_name.description: The name of the destination ledger.

next_page_token.description: The token to use to request the next page

prev_page_token.description: The token to use to request the previous page
